prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Organ, Drums, Brass, Piano, Bass, but without Guitar.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Piano, Organ, Bass, Drums, and Brass, but no Guitar.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Organ, Drums, Brass, Piano, and Bass, omitting the Guitar.

Style 3:
Guitar is absent from this song, which instead includes Organ, Drums, Brass, Piano, and Bass.
